title: Brie Masters Love in Submission: Submissive in Love
description: Brie Masters Love in Submission (The Brie Series, Volume 3 of 3)Delve into the mysterious domain of BDSM--a world of romance and wickedly hot fun in this epic third novel of the highly popular Brie Series. A haunting dream about Tono Nosaka starts Brie Bennett on an erotic journey around the world. From Tokyo to Moscow, Denver and Tuscany, join Brie as she navigates the bonds of love and friendship. Passions will be tested and hearts broken when secrets are revealed within the circle of friends Brie's made at the Submissive Training Center. Brie is destined to experience the depth and many facets of love in the journey, yet her deepest desire eludes her. Her Master has the power to grant her wish, but it's the one thing he said he'd never do.**This is the third novel in the Brie series - all 8 novellas of the Submissive in Love serial in one beautiful book! Erotic Romance (18+)To be all caught up with Brie you need to have (in order) * Brie Learns the Art of Submission* Brie Embraces the Heart of Submission* Brie Masters Love in Submission (Newly Released!)* Also The Erotic Adventures of Amy and Troy - in this novel you will meet Master Brad Anderson BEFORE he became part of the Submissive Training Center
author: Red Phoenix
